intro_text: An argument breaks out in the Clan over the best way to store fresh-kill for leaf-bare. As a mediator, you step in to settle the dispute.
decline_text: Deciding the matter is too complex for a single cat to handle, you suggest forming a small committee to make the decision. The Clan appreciates your wise approach.

success_outcomes.text: You gather everyone's input and propose a plan that takes into account the various perspectives. The Clan agrees on your plan, commending your mediation skills.

fail_outcomes.text: Despite your efforts, the Clan can't reach an agreement. The leader eventually has to step in and make a decision. This experience is a reminder that some disputes are hard to mediate.

intro_text: Two warriors have a heated argument about a recent hunting trip. You decide to mediate before things get out of hand.
decline_text: Feeling this situation is beyond your skill, you ask a senior warrior to intervene. Watching them handle the situation, you pick up some valuable lessons.

success_outcomes.text: Using your mediation skills, you manage to diffuse the argument. Both warriors calm down, acknowledging your fair judgement.

fail_outcomes.text: Despite your best efforts, the argument escalates. A senior warrior has to intervene. Not every situation can be easily mediated, but you learn from the experience.

intro_text: A dispute breaks out in the Clan about which part of the territory is best for hunting. As a mediator, you try to keep the peace.
decline_text: You decide to consult with some senior warriors before stepping in, believing their experience will help you mediate better. The Clan appreciates your cautious approach.

success_outcomes.text: You hear both sides and suggest a compromise that satisfies everyone. Your skills as a mediator are commended by the Clan.

fail_outcomes.text: Despite your best efforts, the dispute continues. A senior warrior has to intervene. It's a learning experience about how hard mediation can sometimes be.

intro_text: The apprentices are arguing about who is the fastest runner. You decide to step in before the argument escalates.
decline_text: You decide to let the apprentices settle the argument themselves, observing how they handle the situation. Sometimes, stepping back is the best way to mediate.

success_outcomes.text: You suggest a friendly race to determine the fastest runner. The apprentices agree, the argument is settled, and everyone enjoys the race.

fail_outcomes.text: Despite your suggestion of a friendly race, the argument continues. It takes a while for the situation to calm down, but you learn some valuable lessons in mediation.

intro_text: A disagreement over border markings with a neighbouring Clan is causing tension. As a mediator, you decide to intervene.
decline_text: Feeling that the issue is too sensitive for you to handle alone, you consult with the Clan leader before taking any action. The Clan appreciates your wise decision.

success_outcomes.text: You manage to resolve the disagreement by proposing a shared patrol to remark the border. Both Clans appreciate your diplomacy and fairness.

fail_outcomes.text: Despite your efforts, the disagreement escalates into a skirmish. It's a hard lesson in the limits of mediation.
